Package League

package League
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a Card in a League, which is associated with a player and has a specific type
    Coach
    Represents a Coach in a League, which is associated with the Team they coach.
    Data
    Acts as an interface between the applciations objects (League, Team, Match etc.) and the applications text file (LeagueData.txt)
    Goal
    Represents a single Goal in a Match, associated with two players
    League
    Acts the core domain object in this application, represents the League, associated with teams, players, matches, coaches, referees, unaffiliated players, and team managers
    Match
    Represents a single Match played, including details such as week played, home team, away team, score, list of goals, list of substitutions, and list of cards
    Person
    Represents a singular Person in the league, this person is then extended into a Player, Coach, Referee, or Team Manager in the child classes
    Player
    Represents a singular Player in the league, inluding details such as their name, employment status, position, amount of goals, assists, and cards dealt, preferred formation, and pay
    Referee
    Represents a single Referee in the league, including details such as name, employment status, and pay
    Stadium
    Represents a single stadium that a team present in the league occupies, holds details such as name and capacity
    Substitution
    Represents a single Substitution in a match, associated with two players, the player in and the player out
    Team
    Represents a single Team in the league, holding details such as its name, the players assigned to it, the coaches assigned to it, its home ground stadium etc.
    TeamManager
    Represents a singular team manager assigned to a team present in the league, including details such as name, team, and employment status
